title: Recent progress in high-voltage P2-NaxTMO2 materials and their future perspectives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24797-24814
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04790G, Review Article

Manni Li, Weiqi Lin, Yurong Ji, Lianyu Guan, Linyuan Qiu, Yuhong Chen, Qiaoyu Lu, Xiang Ding
P2-type layered materials (NaxTMO2) have become attractive cathode electrodes owing to their high theoretical energy density and simple preparation.
